ModMetaData.name: Twi'lek Race (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Jecrell
ModMetaData.description:
Update of Xens mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2018388859
[img]https://i.imgur.com/GYswkZ7.png[/img]
Support-chat: https://invite.gg/mlie
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/TwilekRace
- Added Royalty faction-patch
--- Original Description --- Twi'lek race by Xen
Twi'leks (From the Star Wars universe) are known for their grace, beauty, and powers of seduction.
They have a high chance to appear with 'beautiful' trait
They have a slight bonus to social interactions, in exchange for a slightly increased appetite (I wanted to do something else for a 'negative' since I did something similar for my Xenn race, but this is actually canon apparently - offworld twi'leks never turn down food, and obesity is considered by many a status symbol)
I may give them 4 stomachs later (which is also canon) - but I almost feel like that would be a bit too unbalancing - maybe 2.
I'll have to gather opinions on that.
